tippy/allowHTML.description: Determines if content strings are parsed as HTML instead of text

tippy/arrow.description: Determines if the tippy has an arrow

tippy/theme.description: Determines the theme of the tippy element.

tippy/sticky.description: Determines if the tippy sticks to the reference element while it is mounted.

tippy/followCursor.description: Determines if the tippy follows the user's mouse cursor.
